Pakcage qx.util.fsm.FiniteStateMachine method : eventListener
The description is unclear, and it doesn't describe the way we must use it. I suggest this instead:
eventListener(Event event) Send a event to this FSM. This event will be dispacthed to states, and transition. Parameters: event The event to send.

I think you are misunderstanding the purpose of that method. You should not be calling it directly. It is intended only to be used as the function that called via an addListener() call, in which case the documentation is correct.
Why don't you post a description of what you're trying to accomplish on the mailing list, and we'll discuss it. I appreciate you posting the bug in order to improve the documentation. For now, though, I'll mark this bug as invalid, and if we discover through discussion that there are documentation changes required, we can re-open it.
Derrell
